segments.text: My eyes keep returning to that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself is a real hazard, its legs are very splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip over backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, reaching for that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's posture is incredibly tense as he focuses.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is complicit in this risky endeavor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm constantly expecting to hear a crash and a cry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls and hits his head on the counter?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is getting wet now from the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That adds another layer of danger if he were to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His parents should really be more aware of this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Children are so often oblivious to immediate physical risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a genuine worry to see such a precarious situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just screaming for an accident to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the instability of that wobbly perch from here.
segments.speaker: PAR
